/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street, lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Cars and bicycles traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the cityscape. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
